statement:
motor.left.target = 0
motor.right.target = 0
call sound.system(-1)
call leds.circle(32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32)
timer.period[0] = 100
onevent timer0
call leds.circle(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)

var i = 16
var s = 17
motor.left.target = 0
motor.right.target = 0
call sound.system(-1)
timer.period[0] = 125
onevent timer0
call leds.circle((s&1)<<5,(s&2)<<4,(s&4)<<3,(s&8)<<2,(s&16)<<1,s&32,(s&64)>>1,(s&128)>>2)
s = (s << 1) & 0xff | (s >> 7) & 1
i -= 1
if i < 0 then
timer.period[0] = 0
end

aseba.clause: mic.intensity > mic.threshold

initVarDecl:
# variables for notes
var notes[6]
var durations[6]
var note_index
var note_count
var wave[142]
var i
var wave_phase
var wave_intensity
initCodeExec:
# init. variables for notes
note_index = 6
note_count = 6
# compute a sinus wave for sound
for i in 0 : 141 do
wave_phase = (i - 70) * 468
call math.cos(wave_intensity, wave_phase)
wave[i] = wave_intensity / 256
end
call sound.wave(wave)
call sound.system(-1)
initCodeDecl:
# when a note is finished, play the next one
onevent sound.finished
if note_index != note_count then
call sound.freq(notes[note_index], durations[note_index])
note_index++
end
statement:
notes = [`$.filter(function (a, i) { return i % 2 == 0; }).map(function (h, i) { return $[2 * i + 1] ? [370, 415, 466, 494, 554][h] : 0; }).join(', ')`]
durations = [`$.filter(function (a, i) { return i % 2 == 1; }).map(function (d) { return d ? 10 * d : 28; }).join(', ')`]
note_index = 1
note_count = 6
call sound.freq(notes[0], durations[0])

state = state & `0xff ^ $.reduce(function (a, b, i) { return b !== 0 ? a | [128,2,32,8][i] : a; }, 0)` | `$.reduce(function (a, b, i) { return b === 1 ? a | [128,2,32,8][i] : a; }, 0)`
callsub display_state

state ^= `$.reduce(function (a, b, i) { return b ? a | [128,2,32,8][i] : a; }, 0)`
callsub display_state

`$[0] === 0 ? 'state = 0' : $[0] > 0 ? 'if state < 255 then
state++
end' : 'if state > 0 then
state--
end'`
callsub display_state
